        public void pushPassword(java.lang.String password,
                         long time)
        Adds a new password to this history (only if this history is in "Active" state).
        Parameters:
        password -
        time -

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears the password content from this history. Does not modify the "Active" state of this history.

      • iterator

        public java.util.Iterator<HistoryHandler.Entry> iterator()
        Returns an iterator over all entries in this password history in sorted order (last-in-first-out).
        Returns:
        Iterator

      • isActive

        public boolean isActive()
        Whether this History is keeping new password changes. ("Active" state of this history.)
        Returns:
        true if and only if History is switched ON

      • setActive

        public void setActive(boolean v)
        Sets whether this history is keeping new password changes. ("Active" state of this history.)
        Parameters:
        v - active state (true == active)

        public int getListSize()
        The number of passwords actually stored in this history.

      • getMaxEntries

        public int getMaxEntries()
        The maximum number of passwords that can be stored in this history.

      • setContentPw3

        public void setContentPw3(java.lang.String pw3)
        Creates the content of this history from its PW3-format string representation. (The parameter text - if specified - also determines the new "Active" state of this history.)
        Parameters:
        pw3 - textual representation of password history as used in PW3; null or empty string clear the content
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException

      • getContentPw3

        public java.lang.String getContentPw3()
        Returns a string representation of this history consisting at least (empty content) in a 5-byte header sequence. (This is the text conforming to PW3 format definition. The text contains information of the actual "Active" state of this history.)
        Returns:
        String (min 5 chars)
